text: Julián Isaías Rodríguez Díaz (16 December 1942 – 12 January 2025) was a Venezuelan politician and lawyer. He was the Vice President of Venezuela from January 2000 to December 2000 under the Hugo Chávez administration. Rodríguez died in Caracas, Venezuela on 12 January 2025, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Vice presidents of Venezuela Category:Venezuelan lawyers
title: Isaías Rodríguez
